title: orthographic
description: An orthographic camera containing properties to create an orthographic projection matrix.

xmag.description: The floating-point horizontal magnification of the view. Value of zero may cause runtime exceptions and/or undefined behavior.

ymag.description: The floating-point vertical magnification of the view. Value of zero may cause runtime exceptions and/or undefined behavior.

zfar.description: The floating-point distance to the far clipping plane. `zfar` must be greater than `znear`.

znear.description: The floating-point distance to the near clipping plane.
